caption.p: Venn diagram of predominant begomovirus detected. A total of 126 individual species were examined for the presence of predominant begomovirus in the five sampling regions. The number of begomovirus-positive plants (97) showing single, double, triple or quadruple infections is reported. The values are also reported in percentage in parenthesis. Virus acronyms: Pepper huasteco yellow vein virus (PHYVV), Rhynchosia golden mosaic virus, (RhGMV), Rhynchosia golden mosaic Sinaloa virus (RhGMSV), Sida mosaic Sinaloa virus (SiMSiV), Tomato yellow leaf curl virus (TYLCV).
